title: Week 3: The walk-through
body: This last week's been extremely busy, so I apologize for not getting more posts. We had the official walk-through with the city building department on Wednesday at the new location, and it was a breeze... much easier than the last time. The building inspector said the only unexpected item we might have to buy would be a grease accumulator for our bar sink, which won't be too awfully expensive. So, all in all, it was a good week. Also, the April calendar is online and in print, so swing by and pick one up whenever you get a chance. Have a great weekend everyone!
author: Dan

comments.author: brad
comments.body: the April calendar gets my heart all a-flutter.... nice job guys...

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body: Did you see the nod to the moxie move in GO? I'm so proud.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: It was a nice mention, but West Walnut isn't GOING. There's still a lot of cool stuff on our block, with or without The Mox!

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body: I was mostly proud of the "Moxie doubters" for "GONE" part.
